name: list_comments
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool tiktok_private.
Tool description: Fastest,  Highly Maintained TikTok API,  Build For Massive TikTok Scraping. Get TikTok User Profile, Post, Feed, Trends, Hashtags, Music and Download Video Without Watermark.
API description: Fetches comments for the specified TikTok post using the given parameters.

aweme_id.description: The ID of the TikTok post for which to retrieve comments.

count.description: The number of comments to retrieve. Defaults to 10.

cursor.description: The position from where to start retrieving comments. Defaults to 0.

proxy.description: The proxy server to use for the request. Defaults to None.
